content: संकीर्ण {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Mixed together, intermingled. {@--2@} Confused, miscellaneous. {@--3@} Shattered, spread, crowded. {@--4@} Indistinct. {@--5@} In rut, intoxicated; <ls>H. 4. 17.</ls> {@--6@} Of mixed caste, of impure origin. {@--7@} Impure, adulterated. {@--8@} Narrow, contracted. --र्णः {@--1@} A man of a mixed caste. {@--2@} A mixed note or mode. {@--3@} An elephant in rut, an intoxicated elephant. --र्णं A difficulty. --र्णा A kind of riddle.
